text: This is a list of chess grandmasters rated 2700+, plus other players of the highest status. There are at present over 1900 chess grandmasters, and the full list is on English wiki. Notice also the list in Di Felice, Gino 2017. Chess International Titleholders, 1950–2016. McFarland, ISBN 978-1-4766-7132-1. *In alphabetical order of surnames, please, on each list: == Chess grandmasters == === Living === *Maurice Ashley *Michael Adams *Toby Obirs *Ben Finegold *Eric Hansen *Evgeny Alekseev *Zoltan Almasi *Viswanathan Anand *Ulf Andersson *Levon Aronian *Etienne Bacrot *Evgeny Bareev *Magnus Carlsen *Fabiano Caruana *Maia Chiburdanidze *Pavel Eljanov *Jaan Ehlvest *Laurent Fressinek *Nona Gaprindashvili *Boris Gelfand *Alexander Grischuk *Hou Yifan *Robert Huebner *Vassily Ivanchuk *Dmitry Jakovenko *Baadur Jobova *Gata Kamsky *Sergey Karjakin *Anatoly Karpov *Rustam Kasimdzhanov *Garry Kasparov *Alexandra Kosteniuk *Vladimir Kramnik *Pontus Carlsson *Peter Leko *Ding Liren *Vladimir Malakhov *Shakhriyar Mamedyarov *Luke McShane *Amon Simutowe *Alexander Morozevich *Alexander Motylev *Sergei Movsesian *Henrique Mecking *Hikaru Nakamura *David Navara *Ian Nepomniachtchi *Illya Nyzhnyk *Fridrik Olafsson *Judit Polgar *Susan Polgar *Ruslan Ponomariov *Lajos Portisch *Teimour Radjabov *Yasser Seirawan *Alexei Shirov *Nigel Short *Sanan Sjugirov *Wesley So *Boris Spassky *Jonathan Speelman *Peter Svidler *Jan Timman *Evgeny Tomashevsky *Veselin Topalov *Maxime Vachier-Lagrave *Francisco Vallejo Pons *Nikita Vitiugov *Hao Wang *Yue Wang *Radoslaw Wojtaszek *Jun Xie *Ethan Evans Damani *Vidit Gujhrati *Akiko Sato *Arnold Tadeus *Andrew Hong === Deceased === *Paul Morphy *Harold Paul *Adolf Anderssen *Johannes Zukertort *Pal Benko *Efim Bogolyubov *Mikhail Botvinnik *David Bronstein *José Raúl Capablanca *Max Euwe *Bobby Fischer *Vugar Gashimov *Svetozar Gligoric *Paul Keres *Viktor Korchnoi *Bent Larsen *Tony Miles *Aaron Nimzovich *Lembit Oll *Tigran Petrosian *Samuel Reshevsky *Akiba Rubinstein *Vasily Smyslov *Howard Staunton *Mikhail Tal *Carlos Torre Repetto ==Related pages== *List of World Chess Champions ==Other websites== * FIDE top players *Chessgraphs.com -
